text: Mampsoukrenai or Mapsoukrenai was a settlement and station (mutatio) of ancient Cilicia, on the road between Tyana and Tarsus, inhabited during Roman Byzantine times. Its site is tentatively located near Kırıtlar in Asiatic Turkey. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Cilicia Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Populated places of the Byzantine Empire Category:History of Mersin Province
title: Mampsoukrenai
